IndexOutOfBoundsException(java.lang.Stri.Description: Constructs an IndexOutOfBoundsException with the specified detail message.

IndexOutOfBoundsException().Description: Constructs an IndexOutOfBoundsException with no detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown to indicate that an index of some sort (such as to an array, to a string, or to a vector) is out of range. Applications can subclass this class to indicate similar exceptions.
